0,0.description: Hospital room is small, dirty, cold and dark.
0,0.title: Hospital room

-1,0.description: Narrow, cold and dark corridor, walls are gray with a bloody hand prints all over them. It is very long, you cannot see its end, only some blinking, broken light far away.
-1,0.title: Dark corridor

1,0.title: X ray room
1,0.description: Small, dark room with a one light board on the wall filled with x rays of people's anatomy, various pictures of bones and a couple of machines, one is like a casket for full body x ray.

-1,1.title: Delivery room
-1,1.description: Baby cribs, some of them are pink,some are blue, it seems empty, although there are stuffed animals, one teddy bear is on the floor,pressed with a shelf and plays creepy lullaby.

0,1.title: Emergency room
0,1.description: Tight, smelly room with 5 beds, couple of chairs, needles and scalpels on the floor. There is blood on the curtains which are separating each bed.

1,1.title: Operating room
1,1.description: Dark and cold space with one metal bed and a shelf full of bloody operating instruments.Bed is empty, but sheets on the bed are full with blood and sleaze.
